name: Monster Defender (itch)
description:
This is a game is about response time. You have to be fast and press the Right Buttons to come further.

There are infinite waves of Monsters and after every wave you have overcome it will get harder! You have to pick the right color to destroy an enemy.

 Controls:

  • press  arrow-up for red color
  • press  arrow-left for green color
  • press arrow-down for orange color
  • press arrow right for yellow color
